title: Drawing, "Marmite", 1951
markings: Stamps: Designer's stamp printed in brown ink, lower right: eva s. zeisel industrial design/431 RIVERSIDE DRIVE NEW YORK CITY; see inscription
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite with dimensions; center right: See plaster model; lower left: A-A; in designer's stamp: JUNE 18, 1951/MARMITE/6

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Marmite", 1951.
1951. Graphite on vellum. Gift of Eva Zeisel. 1993-11-44.
